pages.text: Surface mode will extend a set of blocks you're looking at. See the images on the right for an example.$(br2)Fuzzy mode will allow the gadget to target any blocks, or only the same blocks as the one you're looking at.

pages.title: Surface Fuzzy
pages.text: Switch the images above to see the different options

This mode is also available for the exchanger, and fuzzy mode works the same. $(br2)In addition, connected mode will only exchange blocks that are connected to the ones you're looking at. See the images to the right for an explanation.
